John joined CO/DE in October 2018.

He has worked as a civilian malware analyst with the United States Air Force, reverse engineering malcious software threats to US Air and Space assets, a security researcher with Battelleâ€™s Mission Focused Tools team, and a senior engineer with Columbus IoT security startup, Finite State.

His interests include reverse engineering, vulnerability research, embedded system exploitation, and automating vulnerability discovery.
